- Expected value of Lottery B = (-4000 * 0.25) + (-2000 * 0.25) + (0 * 0.50) = -1500 Euros

- Variance of Lottery B = [( (-4000 - (-1500))² * 0.25 ) + ( (-2000 - (-1500))² * 0.25 ) + ( (0 - (-1500))² * 0.50 )] = [(-2500)² * 0.25 + (-500)² * 0.25 + (1500)² * 0.50] = (6,250,000 * 0.25) + (250,000 * 0.25) + (2,250,000 * 0.50) = 1,562,500 + 62,500 + 1,125,000 = 2,750,000

Thus, Lottery B has a smaller variance (2,750,000) compared to Lottery A (6,750,000). The decision reason prefers Lottery B.
